    4 -Way Fogger

    1. Home
    2. Drip Irrigation
    3. 4 -Way Fogger

    Drip Irrigation

    Emitting Devices

    4 -Way Fogger

    • Specially designed Anti-Drip device prevents water dripping after each irrigation cycle.
    • Anti-Drip device activates automatically at pressures above 1.5 kg/cmÂ² to start fogger operation.
    • Shuts down automatically when pressure drops below 0.7 kg/cmÂ², stopping fogger operation.
    • Bridgeless design ensures completely drip-free performance.
    • Produces fine, uniform droplets of approximately 65 microns at a nominal pressure of 4 kg/cmÂ².
    • Constructed from acid-resistant materials, allowing safe use with agricultural chemicals.
    • System can be easily cleaned using suitable acid treatment.
    • Operates efficiently within a pressure range of 2.5 to 5 kg/cmÂ².
    • Recommended working pressure is 4.0 kg/cmÂ² for optimal performance.
    • Equipped with a press-fit type inlet connector and 120 mesh (130 micron) filtration for clog-free operation.

    Application

    Designed for efficient cooling and humidification in greenhouses, poultry sheds, cow sheds, and other livestock environments. Ideal for irrigation over rooting tables, plant propagation, and seed germination under controlled conditions. Ensures uniform fogging and moisture distribution, creating an optimal microclimate for plant and animal growth.

    How to Choose the Right Irrigation Filter

    Know Your Water Source

    Each water source contains different types of impurities.

    Water Source Common Impurities Recommended Filter Type
    Borewell / Tube well Sand, silt, small particles Screen Filter
    Canal / River Algae, leaves, organic matter Disc Filter
    Pond / Tank Sand + organic matter Sand Filter + Disc Filter (Combination)
    Municipal / Tap Water Minor dust or particles Screen Filter

    Check the Water Quality

    • â€¢ If water has sand or fine soil â†’ Use Screen Filter
    • â€¢ If water has algae or organic matter â†’ Use Disc Filter
    • â€¢ If water is muddy or mixed with debris â†’ Use Sand + Disc Filter

    Match the Filter to Your Irrigation Type

    Irrigation Type Suitable Filter
    Drip Irrigation Disc Filter / Screen Filter
    Sprinkler System Screen Filter/ Disc Filter
    Large Area / Farm Sand Filter + Disc Filter
    Greenhouse / Nursery Disc Filter/ Screen Filter

    Consider Flow Rate and Micron Rating

    • ðŸ’§ Choose a filter that matches your systemâ€™s flow rate (mÂ³/hr).
    • ðŸŒ¿ Micron rating decides how fine the filtration is:
    • o 100â€“150 Micron â†’ Ideal for drip irrigation
    • o 200 Micron â†’ Ideal for sprinklers
    • o Below 100 Micron â†’ For very fine filtration

    Go for Easy Maintenance

    Always choose a filter that is easy to clean and maintain:

    • ðŸ’§ â€¢ Screen Filter: Easy to remove and wash manually
    • ðŸŒ¿ â€¢ Disc Filter: Can be cleaned or backwashed easily
    • ðŸŒ¿ â€¢ Sand Filter: Requires regular backwashing for best performance

    Thin Wall Drip Tape Fittings

    1. Home
    2. Economical Irrigation
    3. Thin Wall Drip Tape Fittings

    Economical Irrigation

    Drip Tubing & Fittings

    VIDHI PRO TAPE TO TAPE

    • Joins two sections of drip tape securely in irrigation systems.
    • Provides a leak-proof and tight connection
    • Maintains consistent water pressure and flow throughout the line.
    • Helps in extending drip tape length as per field requirement.
    • Useful for repairing damaged sections of drip tape easily.
    • Ensures smooth and uninterrupted water distribution.
    • Simple to install and remove without special tools.
    • Enhances efficiency and durability of the drip irrigation system

    VIDHI PRO LATERAL TO TAPE

    • Connects drip tape to the main lateral pipe securely.
    • Ensures smooth water transfer from lateral pipe to drip tape.
    • Provides a leak-proof and durable connection.
    • Maintains uniform pressure and water flow in the system.
    • Easy to install and remove without any special tools.
    • Helps in efficient water distribution across crop rows.

    VIDHI PRO TAPE ENDCAP

    • Used to close the end of drip tape lines securely.
    • Prevents water leakage and ensures proper sealing.
    • Helps maintain uniform pressure within the drip line.
    • Allows easy reopening for flushing and maintenance.
    • Simple to install and remove without any tools.
    • Ensures efficient water management and prevents wastage.
    • Made from durable, UV-resistant material for long life.

    Tape start connector

    • Designed to link sub-main pipelines with drip tape efficiently for smooth water flow.
    • Works in combination with a grommet seal to ensure a tight fit and eliminate leakage issues.
    • Manufactured from high-grade 100% material , ensuring durability and long service life.
    • Provides a secure and stable connection, supporting reliable performance in the field.

    Rubber Grommet

    • Used together with a tape starter connector to securely attach drip tape with the sub-main line.
    • Ensures a tight and leak-proof joint, preventing any water loss during irrigation.
    • Manufactured using 100% virgin raw material, giving it high durability and long service life.
    • Offered in Natural Rubber, Nitrile, and EPDM variants to suit different field and water conditions.
    • Provides a strong sealing grip, making the overall irrigation connection reliable and efficient.

    Tape to Tape Connector

    • Designed to securely connect the two ends of drip tape with ease.
    • Provides a strong, leak-resistant sealing at the joint.
    • Guarantees tight fitting without any chance of water dripping.
    • Completely adhesive-free design, making installation simple and clean.

    Tape End Cap

    • Helps in sealing the tail end of the drip tape effectively.
    • Allows convenient flushing and cleaning of the drip line.
    • Designed for quick opening and closing during maintenance.
    • Manufactured using premium virgin material to ensure long durability.
    • Built for long-term performance with reliable end-closure functionality.

    Tape Tap Connector/ Lateral to Tape Valve

    • Helps in regulating and controlling the water flow as needed.
    • Provides a tight and secure connection to prevent any leakage.
    • Delivers a firm, drip-free joint for smooth operation.
    • Works without requiring any kind of adhesive, making installation simple.

    Lay Flat to Drip Line Connector

    • Designed to link the lay flat pipe with the drip line efficiently.
    • Provides a firm and secure connection that prevents leakage.
    • Guarantees a tight, drip-free joint for smooth water flow.
    • Installation is hassle-free as it works without any adhesive.

    Lay Flat to Drip Tape Connector

    • Helps in attaching the lay flat pipe directly to the drip tape with ease.
    • Offers a secure and tight connection that avoids any water leakage.
    • Ensures a strong, drip-free joint for reliable performance.
    • No adhesives required, making installation quick and convenient.

    Lay Flat Punch

    • Designed to create precise holes on lay flat pipes for attaching drip lines or drip tapes.
    • Helps in making clean openings so drip lines or drip tapes can be easily connected.
